ptolemy.backtrack.eclipse.plugin.editor

Class MultiPageCompilationUnitEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • CompilationUnitEditor
      • ptolemy.backtrack.eclipse.plugin.editor.PtolemyEditor
        • ptolemy.backtrack.eclipse.plugin.editor.MultiPageCompilationUnitEditor

  • public class MultiPageCompilationUnitEditor
extends PtolemyEditor
    Multi-page editor with Ptolemy semantic highlighting and transformation tab. This editor is the main user interface in the Eclipse plugin. It extends Eclipse's Java editor, with Ptolemy semantic highlighting added. It also creates two tabs in the editor: the "Raw" tab provides an ordinary Java editing environment to the user; the "Preview" tab shows the preview of backtracking transformation.
    Since:
    Ptolemy II 5.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Thomas Feng
    Accepted Rating:
    Red (tfeng)
    Proposed Rating:
    Red (tfeng)
